column5: Accelerate your career in the fast-growing sector of sustainability with our MSc Management with Sustainability. Taught entirely online by research-active experts.A CAREER-FOCUSED MSC MANAGEMENT WITH SUSTAINABILITY, DESIGNED FOR ASPIRING SUSTAINABLE LEADERSThis 100% online MSc Management with Sustainability is for leaders and aspiring leaders aiming to progress into more senior roles, particularly within a sustainable business. As you study, you’ll be developed into a well-rounded, thoughtful, active, reflective and practical professional with a genuine appreciation of the strategic and operational challenges in running an organisation in a sustainable way.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
